title: Progress On Web Site
body: I'm making great progress on the Website. Adding more pages as I go.
I've linked this page to my Personal Project page. Check it out here.

title: My Latest YouTube Acheivements
body: I'm truly blessed with my YouTube channel. I've posted my first video on May 5, 2020. Six months later I posted 150 videos, received 200,000 views and was gifted with 1800 subscribers.
Thank-you everyone for supporting my channel. You've helped me open a new chapter in my life.
If you haven't yet, remember to subscribe to my YouTube Channel @HeapArt.

title: New Site Feature! Random Video of the Day
body: I added a new section to the home page to display a random Origami Tutorial or one of Our Exotic Paper Airplane Tutorials.
Come back every day to find something new. There is over 140 tutorials on my YouTube Channel. It's bound to show You something fresh every day!

title: New Site Feature! Email List
body: I've created a new form to accept emails using Google Forms!
Click here to see it and Subscribe to my Email List!
